channel.title: Error in run.bat
channel.description:
when i try to run the csk-client v3 i get this (well its with ANY CLIENT i run)
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
can some1 tell me whats wrong?

item.title: Error in run.bat
item.dc:creator: @Hockey4lifexx Hockey4lifexx
item.description:
@Hockey4lifexx wrote:

didnt work either i get 100 errors when compiled and then the run.bat has the same error as b4.

Read full topic

item.title: Error in run.bat
item.dc:creator: @thomas121794 thomas121794
item.description:
@thomas121794 wrote:

PS:you have to change the compiler and run.bat for this to work

Ok Right click your compiler and hit edit. Copy/paste this code.

@echo off echo Ghost's Simple Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac.exe" *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\java.exe" server pause

Now rightclick your run.bat hit edit adn put this.

@echo off color 0a title ProjGhost pkz "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\java.exe" server pause

And if you want to add a auto restarter downlaod this
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=C3TFU92D

save this in a folder. Run hit, click yes. set the time you want it to reset. and hit start.

Np

~Thomas121794

Read full topic

item.title: Error in run.bat
item.dc:creator: @manofwar12 manofwar12
item.description:
@manofwar12 wrote:

[quote=“Hockey4lifexx, post:11, topic:168329”]i get an error when i edited it:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: Bad version n umber in .class file at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(ClassLoader.java:620) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(SecureClassLoader.java:12 4) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(URLClassLoader.java:260) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$100(URLClassLoader.java:56) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:195) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:188) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:306) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:268) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:251) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(ClassLoader.java:319) Press any key to continue . . .[/quote]

Not sure about that, mine works perfectly. uhm, hold on.

Read full topic

item.title: Error in run.bat
item.dc:creator: @manofwar12 manofwar12
item.description:
@manofwar12 wrote:

[quote=“Hockey4lifexx, post:9, topic:168329”][quote author=manofwar12 link=topic=227925.msg1957276#msg1957276 date=1198816876]

oh i did that durr…i used rar to extract it

ok, so open the folder, find run.bat, rightclick over it and select edit, replace whats in there with:

@ECHO OFF TITLE CSk-Client color 0a java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar client pause
[/quote]

read after i edited it[/quote]

whats that mean? lolz

item.title: Error in run.bat
item.dc:creator: @manofwar12 manofwar12
item.description:
@manofwar12 wrote:

if u have winrar rightclick and click 'extract to (client name)
youll get a yellow folder on your desktop. open it. find run.bat, rightclick then select edit.
delete whats there and replace it with

@ECHO OFF TITLE CSk-Client color 0a java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar client pause

Read full topic
